main event: A civilian pilot observed a very bright, white flash the size of the moon moving fast, then slowing down and moving away slowly west of Phillipsburg, Pennsylvania on February 11, 1949.
interesting points: The observation lasted about 5 minutes,Three commercial airliners were in the area during the sighting,The flash was described as very bright and characteristic of a meteor-type flame,The object was observed traveling from south to north,The sighting was logged under Project Blue Book which investigated UFO sightings.
